branding.tagline: Pulse keeps things simple — fast voice, structured text, and a focus on stability.
branding.subtitle: No distractions. No bloat. Just connection.

warnings.insecureBody: You are on an insecure connection (HTTP). Voice and video features may not work. Set up HTTPS for full functionality.

invite.registrationRequiresInvite: Registration requires an invite link. Ask an existing member to invite you.

sidebar.startDm: Start a DM to begin chatting

dmConfirm.deleteMessage: This will permanently delete all messages for both sides. This cannot be undone.
dmConfirm.encryptionMessage: This will enable end-to-end encryption for this conversation. This cannot be reversed.

addSection.heading: Add Friend
addSection.description: Search for users on this server to send a friend request.

confirmRemove.title: Remove Friend
confirmRemove.message: Are you sure you want to remove this friend?

empty.noServersSubtitle: Check back later or join a server with an invite link.
empty.noFederatedActive: No active federated instances. Ask your admin to set up federation.
empty.noFederatable: Connected instances have no federatable servers.

empty.addBelow: Add a FoundryVTT server URL below.

main.heading: FoundryVTT Launcher
main.addServerHint: Add a server on the left and press [icon] to launch it.
main.runningDesktop: Foundry is running in a separate window. Switch Pulse servers freely — it won't reload.
main.runningBrowser: Running in a browser — Foundry will open in a popup window so HTTP servers work alongside HTTPS Pulse.

confirmLeave.title: Leave Server
confirmLeave.message: Are you sure you want to leave this server?

confirmDelete.title: Delete Server
confirmDelete.message: This will permanently delete {{name}} and all of its data including channels, messages, and members. This action cannot be undone.

fields.name: Name
fields.allowNewUsersDescription: Allow anyone to register and join your server. If disabled, only users you invite can join.
fields.discoverableDescription: Show this server in the Discover directory so anyone can find and join it.
fields.federatableDescription: Allow users from federated Pulse instances to discover and join this server.

roles.emptyState: Select a role to edit or create a new one

permissionDescriptions.SEND_MESSAGES: Grants the ability to send messages in channels.
permissionDescriptions.REACT_TO_MESSAGES: Grants the ability to react to messages.
permissionDescriptions.UPLOAD_FILES: Grants the ability to upload files in channels.
permissionDescriptions.JOIN_VOICE_CHANNELS: Grants the ability to join voice channels.
permissionDescriptions.SHARE_SCREEN: Grants the ability to share the screen.
permissionDescriptions.ENABLE_WEBCAM: Grants the ability to enable the webcam.
permissionDescriptions.MANAGE_CHANNELS: Grants the ability to create, update, and delete channels.
permissionDescriptions.MANAGE_CHANNEL_PERMISSIONS: Grants the ability to manage channel-specific permissions for roles and users.
permissionDescriptions.MANAGE_CATEGORIES: Grants the ability to create, update, and delete categories.
permissionDescriptions.MANAGE_ROLES: Grants the ability to create, update, and delete roles.
permissionDescriptions.MANAGE_EMOJIS: Grants the ability to create, update, and delete emojis.
permissionDescriptions.MANAGE_SETTINGS: Grants the ability to manage server settings.
permissionDescriptions.MANAGE_USERS: Grants the ability to manage users.
permissionDescriptions.MANAGE_MESSAGES: Grants the ability to manage messages from all users by editing or deleting them.
permissionDescriptions.MANAGE_STORAGE: Grants the ability to manage storage, such as enabling or disabling uploads.
permissionDescriptions.MANAGE_INVITES: Grants the ability to create, edit, and delete server invites.
permissionDescriptions.MANAGE_UPDATES: Grants the ability to perform updates.
permissionDescriptions.MANAGE_PLUGINS: Grants the ability to manage plugins.
permissionDescriptions.EXECUTE_PLUGIN_COMMANDS: Grants the ability to execute plugin commands.
permissionDescriptions.PIN_MESSAGES: Grants the ability to pin and unpin messages in channels.
permissionDescriptions.MANAGE_WEBHOOKS: Grants the ability to create, edit, and delete webhooks.
permissionDescriptions.MANAGE_AUTOMOD: Grants the ability to manage auto-moderation rules.

updateRole.defaultRoleAlert: This is the default role. New members will be assigned this role upon joining.
updateRole.ownerRoleAlert: This is the owner role. This role has all permissions and cannot be deleted or have its permissions changed.

upload.heading: Upload Custom Emojis
upload.description: Select an emoji to edit or upload new ones to customize your server

update.namePlaceholder: Enter emoji name (no spaces or special characters)
update.nameHint: This will be used as :{{name}}: in messages

confirmDelete.title: Delete Emoji
confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this emoji? This action cannot be undone.

soundpad.heading: Soundpad
soundpad.description: Manage sounds available in the voice channel soundpad

empty.title: No sounds yet
empty.hint: Upload MP3, WAV or OGG files to get started

users.cardDescription: Manage server users and their permissions
users.searchPlaceholder: Search users by name or identity...

invites.cardDescription: Manage invitation links for users to join the server
invites.searchPlaceholder: Search invites by code or creator...

webhooks.heading: Webhooks
webhooks.description: Webhooks allow external services to send messages to your channels.
webhooks.empty: No webhooks yet. Create one to get started.

automod.heading: Auto-Moderation
automod.description: Automatically filter messages based on rules.
automod.empty: No auto-mod rules. Create one to get started.

federation.cardDescription: Connect with other Pulse instances to form a federated network. Users from federated instances can join your servers using their home identity.

fields.enableDescription: Allow this instance to participate in the Pulse federation network.

instances.cardDescription: Manage connections to other Pulse instances.
instances.empty: No federated instances yet. Add one to get started.

plugins.cardDescription: Manage installed plugins and extend your Pulse server with additional features and functionality.

empty.title: No plugins installed
empty.description: Install plugins to add new features and extend the functionality of your Pulse server.

disabledState.title: Plugins are disabled
disabledState.description: Plugins have been disabled for this server. Enable plugins in the server settings to manage and use plugins.

updates.cardDescription: Check for and install updates to keep your Pulse server running with the latest features and security improvements.

alerts.notSupportedBody: Automatic updates are not supported in this environment. Please refer to the documentation for manual update instructions.
alerts.availableBody: A new version ({{version}}) is available for download. Updating will restart the server and may cause temporary downtime.
alerts.upToDateBody: Your server is running the latest version of Pulse.

deleteSection.heading: Delete Server
deleteSection.description: Permanently delete {{name}}. This will remove all channels, messages, roles, and data. This action cannot be undone.

confirm.title: Are you sure?
confirm.description: This will permanently delete {{name}} and all of its data including channels, messages, and members. This action cannot be undone.

profile.title: My Account
profile.description: Update your personal information and settings.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose the display language for the app.

sounds.title: Sounds & Notifications
sounds.description: Control sound effects and desktop notifications.

devices.title: Voice & Video
devices.description: Configure your audio and video devices.

language.heading: Display Language
language.description: Choose the language used throughout the interface. Changes take effect immediately.

logOutConfirm.title: Log Out
logOutConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to log out? Your end-to-end encryption keys will be cleared from this device. Make sure you have a backup of your keys before proceeding.

theme.heading: Theme
theme.description: Choose how the app looks for you.

chatDensity.heading: Chat Density
chatDensity.description: Choose between a cozy or compact message layout.

messageSpacing.heading: Message Spacing
messageSpacing.description: Control the space between message groups.

fontScaling.heading: Font Scaling
fontScaling.description: Adjust the text size in chat messages.

zoomLevel.heading: Zoom Level
zoomLevel.description: Scale the entire interface. Best suited for desktop.

status.keysRegisteredSubtitle: Your DM messages are encrypted with the Signal Protocol
status.noKeys: No encryption keys found on this device
status.noKeysSubtitle: Import a backup to restore your keys, or start a DM to generate new ones

encryption.warning: Important: Your encryption keys are the only way to read your encrypted messages. If you lose your keys and don't have a backup, past encrypted messages will be permanently unreadable. Keep your backup file and passphrase in a secure location.

validation.passphraseTooShort: Passphrase must be at least 8 characters
validation.noRestorePassphrase: Please enter the passphrase used during backup

devices.screenSharingNote: Screen sharing settings take effect on your next share.
devices.systemAudioDescription: Share system audio during screen sharing. Requires a virtual audio driver installed to /Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/HAL/.

driverStatus.installedInactive: Driver installed but not active (restart coreaudiod)

toasts.driverInstalled: Audio driver installed — 'Pulse Audio' device is now available

sounds.masterVolumeDescription: Control the overall volume for all sounds.
sounds.categoriesDescription: Enable or disable sounds for each category.
sounds.desktopNotificationsDescription: Show browser notifications when you receive messages while the tab is in the background.
sounds.notificationsBlocked: Notifications are blocked by your browser.
sounds.notificationsDescription: Receive alerts for new messages when the tab is not focused.
sounds.notificationsBlockedWarning: Notifications are blocked. To enable them, update your browser's site permissions for this page and refresh.

fields.name: Name
fields.privateDescription: Restricts access to this channel to specific roles and members.
fields.slowModeDescription: Limit how often users can send messages in this channel.

security.cardDescription: Manage some security settings for this channel

e2ee.label: End-to-End Encryption
e2ee.enabled: End-to-end encryption is enabled for this channel
e2ee.warning: Once enabled, E2EE cannot be disabled. Existing messages will remain unencrypted, but all new messages will be encrypted. Server-side search and automod will not work for encrypted messages.

toasts.failedRotateToken: Failed to rotate file access token

types.textDescription: Share text, images, files and more
types.voiceDescription: Hangout with voice, video and screen sharing

createServer.title: Create a Server
createServer.description: Give your new server a name to get started.

inviteSection.text: Have an invite? Enter the code or link below.
inviteSection.label: Invite code or link

createInvite.title: Create Server Invite
createInvite.description: Create a new invitation link for users to join the server.

confirmAction.defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

toasts.success: You are now an owner of this server

assignRole.title: Assign role to {{name}}
assignRole.selfAssignAlert: You are assigning a role to yourself.
assignRole.allRolesAssigned: This user already has all available roles.

empty.title: No logs yet
empty.subtitle: Logs will appear here when the plugin generates them

sidebar.heading: Settings
sidebar.noSettings: No settings available for this plugin

confirmDelete.title: Delete Message
confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this message? This action is irreversible.

confirmDelete.title: Delete Channel
confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this channel? This action cannot be undone.

confirmPurge.title: Purge All Messages
confirmPurge.message: This will permanently delete ALL messages in #{{name}}. To confirm, type: {{name}}

confirmDelete.title: Delete Category
confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this category? This WILL delete all the channels within this category. This action cannot be undone.

empty.noOne: No one in the voice channel
empty.joinPrompt: Join the voice channel to start a meeting

pinnedMessagesPanel.title: Pinned Messages
pinnedMessagesPanel.empty: No pinned messages in this channel.

confirmDelete.title: Delete {{count}} Messages
confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected message(s)? This cannot be undone.

systemMessages.identityReset: 's encryption keys have changed. This may mean they reinstalled the app or reset their keys.

empty.firstPost: Be the first to start a discussion

confirmDelete.title: Delete Post
confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete '{{name}}'? This will permanently remove the post and all its replies.

editTagsDialog.noTags: No tags available. Create tags in the forum settings.

audio.shareSystemAudio: Share all system audio (includes voice chat)

e2eeSetupModal.hasBackupDescription: A server backup of your encryption keys was found. Restore your keys to decrypt previous messages, or generate new keys.
e2eeSetupModal.noBackupDescription: End-to-end encryption requires keys on this device. Generate new keys to get started.

confirmRegenerate.title: Generate New Keys?
confirmRegenerate.description: This will create new encryption keys. Messages encrypted with your previous keys will be unreadable on this device.

toasts.restored: Encryption keys restored from server backup
toasts.generated: Encryption keys generated. Back up your keys in Settings > Encryption.

removeRole.title: Remove Role
removeRole.message: Are you sure you want to remove the role "{{roleName}}" from this user?

kickDialog.title: Kick User
kickDialog.message: Please provide a reason for kicking this user (optional).

banDialog.title: Ban User
banDialog.message: Please provide a reason for banning this user (optional).

unbanDialog.title: Unban User
unbanDialog.message: Are you sure you want to unban this user?

userPopover.setNicknameMessage: Nickname for this server (leave empty to clear)

connectionLost.title: Connection lost
connectionLost.message: Lost connection to the server unexpectedly.
